languages.text: {n}Сервочереп внезапно разражается потоком статики, сквозь которую пробивается голос Теодоры:{/n} "...верные сыны и дочери Бога-Императора, к оружию! Сопротивляйтесь ереси и скверне, что грозит поглотить нашу обитель, и направьте все силы на уничтожение тех, кто посмел..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Сервочереп внезапно разражается потоком статики, сквозь которую пробивается голос Теодоры:{/n} "...верные сыны и дочери Бога-Императора, к оружию! Сопротивляйтесь ереси и скверне, что грозит поглотить нашу обитель, и направьте все силы на уничтожение тех, кто посмел..."

languages.text: {n}A wave of static suddenly erupts from the servo-skull, and you can make out Theodora's words through the noise:{/n} "To arms, loyal sons and daughters of the God-Emperor! Fight the heresy and corruption that threatens to consume our home, and with all your might, destroy those who have dared—"
languages.original_text: {n}Сервочереп внезапно разражается потоком статики, сквозь которую пробивается голос Теодоры:{/n} "...верные сыны и дочери Бога-Императора, к оружию! Сопротивляйтесь ереси и скверне, что грозит поглотить нашу обитель, и направьте все силы на уничтожение тех, кто посмел..."

Fight the heresy and corruption that threatens to consume our abode, and with all your might, destroy those who have dared..."

{n}A wave of static suddenly erupts from the servo-skull, and you can make out Theodora's words through the noise:{/n} "To arms, loyal sons and daughters of the God-Emperor! Fight the heresy and corruption that threatens to consume our home, and with all your might, destroy those who have dared—"

{n}A wave of static suddenly erupts from the servo-skull, and you can make out Theodora's words through the noise:{/n} "To arms, loyal sons and daughters of the God-Emperor! Fight the heresy and corruption that threatens to consume our home, and with all your might, destroy those who have dared—"

languages.text: {n}伺服头骨中突然爆发出了一阵静电音。透过噪音，你听到了西奥多拉的喊话。{/n}“神皇忠诚的儿女们啊，拿起武器吧！与腐化与异端分子勇敢抗争，不要让它们吞噬我们的家园！使出你们的所有力量，消灭那些胆敢——”
languages.original_text: {n}A wave of static suddenly erupts from the servo-skull, and you can make out Theodora's words through the noise:{/n} "To arms, loyal sons and daughters of the God-Emperor! Fight the heresy and corruption that threatens to consume our home, and with all your might, destroy those who have dared—"

traits.locale_text: {n}伺服头骨中突然爆发出了一阵静电音。透过噪音，你听到了西奥多拉的喊话。{/n}“神皇忠诚的儿女们啊，拿起武器吧！与腐化与异端分子勇敢抗争，不要让它们吞噬我们的家园！使出你们的所有力量，消灭那些胆敢——”

languages.text: {n}De repente, el servocráneo estalla en una oleada de estática, y puedes oír las palabras de Theodora a través del ruido:{/n} «¡A las armas, hijos e hijas leales del Dios Emperador! ¡Rechazad la herejía y la corrupción que amenaza con consumir nuestro hogar, y, con todas vuestras fuerzas, destruid a quienes osan...».
languages.original_text: {n}A wave of static suddenly erupts from the servo-skull, and you can make out Theodora's words through the noise:{/n} "To arms, loyal sons and daughters of the God-Emperor! Fight the heresy and corruption that threatens to consume our home, and with all your might, destroy those who have dared—"

traits.locale_text: {n}De repente, el servocráneo estalla en una oleada de estática, y puedes oír las palabras de Theodora a través del ruido:{/n} «¡A las armas, hijos e hijas leales del Dios Emperador! ¡Rechazad la herejía y la corrupción que amenaza con consumir nuestro hogar, y, con todas vuestras fuerzas, destruid a quienes osan...».

languages.text: {n}サーヴォスカルから突然静電気の波が噴き出し、その騒音の中からシオドーラの言葉が聞き取れる。{/n}「神帝陛下の忠実な息子たち、娘たちよ、武器を取れ！我らの故郷を滅ぼさんとする異端と腐敗と戦うのだ。そして、我々に挑んだ者たちを全力を尽くして滅ぼすのだ―」
languages.original_text: {n}A wave of static suddenly erupts from the servo-skull, and you can make out Theodora's words through the noise:{/n} "To arms, loyal sons and daughters of the God-Emperor! Fight the heresy and corruption that threatens to consume our home, and with all your might, destroy those who have dared—"

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴォスカルから突然静電気の波が噴き出し、その騒音の中からテオドラの言葉が聞き取れます。{/n}「神帝陛下の忠実な息子たち、娘たちよ、武器を取れ！私たちの家を滅ぼすと脅す異端と腐敗と戦うのだ。そして、 実際滅ぼす度胸があった敵は全力を尽くして滅ぼすのだ―」
{n}サーヴォスカルから突然静電気の波が噴き出し、その騒音の中からシオドーラの言葉が聞き取れる。{/n}「神帝陛下の忠実な息子たち、娘たちよ、武器を取れ！我らの故郷を滅ぼさんとする異端と腐敗と戦うのだ。そして、我々に挑んだ者たちを全力を尽くして滅ぼすのだ―」

languages.text: {n}Le servocrâne se met soudain à cracher des interférences et, au milieu des grésillements, vous entendez la voix de Théodora :{/n} « Aux armes, fidèles fils et filles de l'Empereur-Dieu ! Combattez l'hérésie et la corruption qui menacent d'anéantir notre foyer, et de toute votre puissance, terrassez ceux qui ont osé... »
languages.original_text: {n}A wave of static suddenly erupts from the servo-skull, and you can make out Theodora's words through the noise:{/n} "To arms, loyal sons and daughters of the God-Emperor! Fight the heresy and corruption that threatens to consume our home, and with all your might, destroy those who have dared—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le servocrâne se met soudain à cracher des interférences et, au milieu des grésillements, vous entendez la voix de Théodora :{/n} « Aux armes, fidèles fils et filles de l'Empereur-Dieu ! Combattez l'hérésie et la corruption qui menacent d'anéantir notre foyer, et de toute votre puissance, terrassez ceux qui ont osé... »

languages.text: {n}Plötzlich ertönt ein Rauschen aus dem Servoschädel, und mittendrin machst du Theodoras Stimme aus:{/n} "Zu den Waffen, loyale Söhne und Töchter des Gottimperators! Bekämpft die Ketzerei und Verderbnis, die unsere Heimat zu verschlingen droht, und vernichtet mit alle Kraft jene, die es gewagt haben ..."
languages.original_text: {n}A wave of static suddenly erupts from the servo-skull, and you can make out Theodora's words through the noise:{/n} "To arms, loyal sons and daughters of the God-Emperor! Fight the heresy and corruption that threatens to consume our home, and with all your might, destroy those who have dared—"

Fight the heresy and corruption that threatens to consume our home, and with all your might, destroy those who have dared—"

languages.text: {n}Hizmeletten aniden bir cızırtı yükseliyor ve seslerin arasında Theodora'nın sözcüklerini seçebiliyorsun.{/n} "Tanrı İmparator'un sadık oğulları ve kızları, silahlarınızın başına! Yuvamızı yok etmek isteyen bu kâfirliğe ve yozlaşmaya karşı savaşın ve bütün gücünüzle onları bertaraf..."
languages.original_text: {n}A wave of static suddenly erupts from the servo-skull, and you can make out Theodora's words through the noise:{/n} "To arms, loyal sons and daughters of the God-Emperor! Fight the heresy and corruption that threatens to consume our home, and with all your might, destroy those who have dared—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Hizmeletten aniden bir cızırtı yükseliyor ve seslerin arasında Theodora'nın sözcüklerini seçebiliyorsun:{/n} "Tanrı İmparator'un sadık oğulları ve kızları, silahlarınızın başına! Yuvamızı yok etmek isteyen bu kâfirliğe ve yozlaşmaya karşı savaşın ve bütün gücünüzle onları bertaraf..."
